name: dear-sns
description: Compose letters at the command line.

scripts.start: node index.js Beatrice, Then is courtesy a turncoat. --yours, Benedick
scripts.formal: node index.js Beatrice, Then is courtesy a turncoat. --yours, Benedick --tpl formal
scripts.sig: node index.js --sig Holmes, detective. Entrepreneur. Smart guy.

author: Graham Marlow
